original_text: A student should be happy if he becomes like his teacher. A servant should be happy if he becomes like his master. People have called me, the master of the house, Beelzebul. You are like those people who live in my house. So do not be surprised when people call you even worse names than they call me.
korean_text: 제자가 그 선생 같고 종이 그 상전 같으면 족하도다 집 주인을 바알세불이라 하였거든 하물며 그 집 사람들이랴

sentences.original_text: if he becomes like his teacher
if he becomes like his master
People have called me, the master of the house, Beelzebul
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 나, 이 집의 주인을, 바알세불이라 불렀습니다

sentences.original_text: when people call you even worse names
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 너희를 나보다 더 나쁜 이름으로 부를 때
나를 부르는 것보다 더 나쁜 이름으로
